ayas.text: ḥā mīm
tanzīlul kitābi minallāhil `azīzil ḥakīm
inna fis samāwāti wal-arḍi la-āyātin lil-mu-minīn
wafī khalqikum wa mā yabuthhu min dābbatin āyātul liqawmiy yūqinūn
wakhtilāfil layli wan nahāri wa mā anzalallāhu minas samā-i min rizqin fa-aḥyā bihil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā wataṣrīfir riyāḥi āyātul liqawmiy ya`qilūn
tilka āyātullāhi natlūhā `alayka bil ḥaqq ۖ fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin ba`dallāhi wa-āyātihi yu-minūn
waylul likulli affākin athīm
yasma`u āyātillāhi tutlā `alayhi thumma yuṣirru mustakbiran ka-an lam yasma`hā ۖ fabashhirhu bi`adhābin alīm
wa idhā `alima min āyātinā shay-anit-takhadhahā huzuwā ۚ ulā-ika lahum `adhābun muhīn
min warā-ihim jahannam ۖ walā yughnī `anhum mā kasabū shay-an walā mat-takhadhū min dūnillāhi awliyā-a ۖ walahum `adhābun `aẓīm
hādhā hudā ۖ wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyāti rabbihim lahum `adhābun min rijzin alīm
allāhul ladhī sakhhara lakumul baḥra litajriyal fulku fīhi bi-amrihi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi wala`allakum tashkurūn
wasakhhara lakum mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi jamī`an minh ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yatafakkarūn
qul lilladhīna āmanū yaghfirū lilladhīna lā yarjūna ayyāmallāhi liyajziya qawman bimā kānū yaksibūn
man `amila ṣāliḥan falinafsih ۖ wa man asā-a fa`alayhā ۖ thumma ilā rabbikum turja`ūn
walaqad ātaynā banī isrā-iylal-kitāba wal ḥukma wan nubuwwata warazaqnāhum minaṭ ṭayyibāti wafaḍḍalnāhum `alal-`ālamīn
wa-ātaynāhum bayyinātin minal-amr ۖ famakh-talafū illā min ba`di mā jā-ahumul `il-mu baghyan baynahum ۚ inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn
thumma ja`alnāka `alā sharī`atim minal-amri fattabi`hā walā tattabi` ahwā-al ladhīna lā ya`lamūn
innahum lan yughnū `anka minallāhi shay-ā ۚ wa innaẓ ẓālimīna ba`ḍuhum awliyā-u ba`ḍ ۖ wallāhu waliyyul muttaqīn
hādhā baṣā-iru linnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmiy yūqinūn
am ḥasibal ladhīnaj-taraḥus sayyi-āti an naj`alahum kal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti sawā-an maḥyāhum wa mamātuhum ۚ sā-a mā yaḥkumūn
wakhalaqallāhus samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqqi walitujzā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat wahum lā yuẓlamūn
afara ayta manit-takhadha ilāhahu hawāhu wa-aḍallahullāhu `alā `il-min wakhatama `alā sam`ihi waqalbihi waja`ala `alā baṣarihi ghishāwatan faman yahdīhi min ba`dillāh ۚ afalā tadhakkarūn
waqālū mā hiya illā ḥayātunad dunyā namūtu wanaḥyā wa mā yuhlikunā illad dahr ۚ wa mā lahum bidhālika min `il-m ۖ in hum illā yaẓunnūn
wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin mā kāna ḥujjatahum illā an qālu-tū bi-ābā-inā in kuntum ṣādiqīn
qulillāhu yuḥyīkum thumma yumītukum thumma yajma`ukum ilā yawmil qiyāmati lā rayba fīhi walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
walillāhi mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wayawma taqūmus sā`atu yawma-idhiy yakhsarul mubṭilūn
watarā kulla ummatin jāthiyah ۚ kullu ummatin tud`ā ilā kitābihal yawma tujzawna mā kuntum ta`malūn
hādhā kitābunā yanṭiqu `alaykum bil ḥaqq ۚ innā kunnā nastansikhu mā kuntum ta`malūn
fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fayudkhiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatih ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul mubīn
wa-ammal ladhīna kafarū afalam takun āyātī tutlā `alaykum fastakbartum wakuntum qawman mujrimīn
wa idhā qīla inna wa`dallāhi ḥaqqun was sā`atu lā rayba fīhā qultum mā nadrī mas sā`atu in naẓunnu illā ẓannan wa mā naḥnu bimustayqinīn
wabadā lahum sayyi-ātu mā `amilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn
waqīlal-yawma nansākum kamā nasītum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā wa ma-wākumun nāru wa mā lakum min nāṣirīn
dhālikum bi-annakumut-takhadhtum āyātillāhi huzuwan wagharratkumul ḥayātud dunyā ۚ fal yawma lā yukhrajūna minhā walā hum yusta`tabūn
falillāhil ḥamdu rabbis samāwāti warabbil-arḍi rabbil `ālamīn
walahul kibriyā-u fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
